Classes/Firebase.html#/s:FC13FirebaseSwi.name: setValue(path:value:)
Classes/Firebase.html#/s:FC13FirebaseSwi.abstract: Performs a synchronous PUT at base url plus given path.

Classes/Firebase.html#/s:FC13FirebaseSwi.name: setValue(path:value:asyncCompletion:)
Classes/Firebase.html#/s:FC13FirebaseSwi.abstract: Performs an asynchronous PUT at base url plus given path.

Classes/Firebase.html#/s:FC13FirebaseSwi.name: post(path:value:)
Classes/Firebase.html#/s:FC13FirebaseSwi.abstract: Performs a synchronous POST at given path from the base url.

Classes/Firebase.html#/s:FC13FirebaseSwi.abstract: Performs an asynchronous POST at given path from the base url.

Classes/Firebase.html#/s:FC13FirebaseSwi.name: put(path:value:)

Classes/Firebase.html#/s:FC13FirebaseSwi.name: put(path:value:asyncCompletion:)
Classes/Firebase.html#/s:FC13FirebaseSwi.abstract: Performs an asynchronous PUT at given path from the base url.

Classes/Firebase.html#/s:FC13FirebaseSwi.name: patch(path:value:)
Classes/Firebase.html#/s:FC13FirebaseSwi.abstract: Performs a synchronous PATCH at given path from the base url.

Classes/Firebase.html#/s:FC13FirebaseSwi.name: patch(path:value:asyncCompletion:)
Classes/Firebase.html#/s:FC13FirebaseSwi.abstract: Performs an asynchronous PATCH at given path from the base url.

Classes/Firebase.html#/s:FC13FirebaseSwi.abstract: Performs a synchronous DELETE at given path from the base url.

Classes/Firebase.html#/s:FC13FirebaseSwi.abstract: Performs an asynchronous DELETE at given path from the base url.

Classes/Firebase.html#/s:FC13FirebaseSwi.name: get(path:)
Classes/Firebase.html#/s:FC13FirebaseSwi.abstract: Performs a synchronous GET at given path from the base url.

Classes/Firebase.html.name: Firebase
Classes/Firebase.html.abstract: This class models an object that can send requests to Firebase, such as POST, GET PATCH and DELETE.
